verses.verse: To you, <WH3068> Yahweh, I call. <WH7121> My rock, <WH6697> don't <WH2814> be deaf to me; <WH2790> lest, if you are silent to me, <WH4911> I would become like those who go down <WH3381> into the pit. <WH953>
Hear <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of my petitions, <WH8469> when I cry <WH7768> to you, <WH5375> when I lift up my hands <WH3027> toward your Most Holy <WH6944> Place. <WH1687>

Don't <WH4900> draw me away with the wicked, <WH7563> with the workers <WH6466> of iniquity <WH205> who speak <WH1696> peace <WH7965> with their neighbors, <WH7453> but mischief <WH7451> is in their hearts. <WH3824>

Give <WH5414> them according to their work, <WH6467> and according to the wickedness <WH7455> of their doings. <WH4611> Give <WH5414> them according to the operation <WH4639> of their hands. <WH3027> Bring <WH7725> back on them what they deserve. <WH1576>
Because they don't <WH995> respect the works <WH6468> of Yahweh, <WH3068> nor the operation <WH4639> of his hands, <WH3027> he will break <WH2040> them down and not build them up. <WH1129>
Blessed <WH1288> be Yahweh, <WH3068> because he has heard <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of my petitions. <WH8469>

Yahweh <WH3068> is my strength <WH5797> and my shield. <WH4043> My heart <WH3820> has trusted <WH982> in him, <WH5826> and I am helped. Therefore my heart <WH3820> greatly rejoices. <WH5937> With my song <WH7892> I will thank him. <WH3034>
Yahweh <WH3068> is their strength. <WH5797> He is a stronghold <WH4581> of salvation <WH3444> to his anointed. <WH4899>
Save <WH3467> your people, <WH5971> and bless <WH1288> your inheritance. <WH5159> Be their shepherd <WH7462> also, <WH5375> and bear them up forever. <WH5769>
